TopicTitle: Rapid unplanned disassembly -> new light installation [Warning: Spoiler in thread]

Articles.Content: I had a slight post-release collision with a small asteroid I was delivering to the lunar surface. Unable to orient properly in time for a soft touchdown, the bottom of my craft was sliced off, layer by layer until all that remained was a pod and decoupler. The remains slid about 50 meters before coming to rest against something nice and sturdy...
You should have said you planned it that way
